code: import'./SeasonDisplay.css';import React from'react';import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";var seasonConfig={summer:{text:"Let\'s Hit the Beach!",iconName:'sun'},winter:{text:"Burr, it\'s Chilly!",iconName:'snowflake'}};var getSeason=function getSeason(lat,month){if(month>2&&month<9){return lat>0?'summer':'winter';}else{return lat>0?'winter':'summer';}};var SeasonDisplay=function SeasonDisplay(props){var season=getSeason(props.lat,new Date().getMonth());var _seasonConfig$season=seasonConfig[season],text=_seasonConfig$season.text,iconName=_seasonConfig$season.iconName;return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"season-display ".concat(season),children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("i",{className:"icon-left massive ".concat(iconName," icon")}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h1",{children:text}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("i",{className:"icon-right massive ".concat(iconName," icon")})]});};export default SeasonDisplay;
